title: Proposals
subtitle: Our proposals
desc:
We want to you to enjoy a real Mochiling experience, that’s our goal, so we propose these possibilities.
The opportunity to be in touch with all our friends from Mochiling, all around the world, to make your trip unique and special…

1.title: Tipping
1.desc: Are you travelling somewhere and you want any tips from people that already been there??? Ask the mochiling members.
1.sub:
What is better, a taxi or a tuk-tuk?
Where to find the local baker?
We will turn your travel in something different.

2.title: Travel
2.desc: You like to travel more calm and with more or less everything organized?… We make you a tailored trip for you.
2.sub:
Which is that country you want to visit when you were a child?
We help you to make it happen.

3.title: Mochiling
3.desc: Decide your trip minute by minute, without pre establish programs, without chains. A mochiling member will accompany to make your trip in something completely UNIQUE & PERSONAL.
3.sub: You can decide your travel at any moment, there is no establish route, a unique experience.

experience.title: Unique experience
experience.desc: A different trip. We will make all the hard work.

contact.title: Contact
contact.desc: Ask to Mochiling team members for your next trip.

expert.title: Mochiling expert
expert.desc: Enjoy the whole experience with one of our guides.

face-2-face.title: A la cartè
face-2-face.desc: You decide your way and we will make it.

customer.title: Customer service
customer.desc: If something doesn’t work as you expected, we are there.

insurance.title: Travel insurance
insurance.desc: Don’t worry a thing, we will be there for helping.

disclaimer: Do you want to check where, what and how we have lived Mochiling?
